data.subject: Evermore (Demo)
data.lyric:
I can't believe the trials of love
 A cruel trick a wretched show
 I fell in love too soon
 too hope

data.subject: How Does A Moment Last Forever (Montmartre) (Demo)
data.lyric:
This is the Paris of my childhood
 These were the borders of my life
 In this crumbling dusty attic

data.subject: Days In The Sun (Demo)
data.lyric:
Days in the sun
 When a life has barely begun
 When no love 
 no prize can't be won
 I remember warm

data.subject: How Does A Moment Last Forever (Music Box) (Demo)
data.lyric:
How does a moment last forever
 How can a story never die
 It is love we must hold onto
 Never easy

data.subject: Main Title : Prologue Pt.2
data.lyric:
Then one night
 an unexpected intrude
 arrived to the castle
 seeking shelter
 from the bitter storm

data.subject: Main Title : Prologue Pt.1
data.lyric:
Once upon a time, in the hidden heart of France
 a handsome young prince lived in a beautiful castle
